FirstTalk: ^Narcisse?excited "There not a lot of thing going around here but I hope you will enjoy your stay
ContinueTalk: ^Narcisse?happy "The weather is pretty good today, I recommand you to go for a stroll around the <color=green>Balto monument</color>.
BlueChoice: ^Narcisse?thinking "The Balto monument is a famous spot around here.
^Narcisse?explaining "Back in the day, people used to send prayer to the status for succes in the arena.
^Narcisse?explaining "Nowaday it's just an old relic good to entertain the local.
^Narcisse?happy "Anyway, I wish you a nice day.
